Gale's experiences of Arcane Hunger have rendered his magic unstable.

Each time he casts a spell of Level 1 or higher the magic might surge and trigger a random magical effect.

Gale's spirit is being drained. He has Disadvantage on Constitution Saving Throws.

Gale's connection with the weave turns volatile, granting Weave Devouring Aura and Magic Allergy.

The Netherese Orb in Gale's body is weakening him. He has Disadvantage on Attack Rolls and all Saving Throws.

Gale's connection with the weave turns volatile, granting Weave Devouring Aura and Magic Allergy.

The Netherese Orb in Gale's body is severely weakening him. He has Disadvantage on Attack Rolls and all Saving Throws. His Movement Speed is halved.

Gale's connection with the weave turns volatile, granting Weave Devouring Aura and Magic Allergy.
